name: Try It Yourself HTML5
summary: PURE HTML5 editor for web designer and developer
short_description:
Edit your file HTML directly online with highlight code, advance search and replace and filesystem API HTML5

Do you want to program directly in your browser? If you want me to download this handy extension that allows you to program in html, css and javascript directly in your browser, save your work and return when you want it with helpful upload button included in my extension that allows you to upload the file html directly from your filesystem. You can check in real time the page output and with the support of the highlights code to validate your project.
Installation Instructions
Download my extension and then upload it to the Addon tab of your browser and then from the "View" menu bar activates the add-on bar, finally click on the icon in miniature "html5" and magically open a new tab with the full web application client: "Try It Yourself HTML5 editor."
Good Job !
